definition: "silk" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 120), occurring in 红, 绿, 累 etc/also pr. [mi4]
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])
vivid and colorful (idiom); true to life/lively and realistic
vivid and colorful (idiom); true to life/lively and realistic

pinyin: dian4 nao3 fu3 zhu4 she4 ji4 yu3 hui4 tu2

sentences.english: The wave form of each main physical quantities are drawn by computer.
sentences.chinese: 還利用計算機繪圖畫出了各主要物理量的波形圖。

sentences.english: Each piece had a gold rim and a band of roses.
sentences.chinese: 每一件都繪有金邊和玫瑰花束。

sentences.english: In the street of Palace, there will be "Happy" word in every streetlight .
sentences.chinese: 在皇宮外大街的每盞路燈上，也都繪着“喜”字。

sentences.english: The exact boundary of the prohibited zone is delineated by hatching on the drawing shown in the Schedule.
sentences.chinese: 有關禁區的確實範圍已用影線繪於附表內圖則上。

sentences.english: The Longman Chinese Reader Series is written for Primary School students, focusing on the development of oral skills.
sentences.chinese: 《朗文小樹繪本叢書》爲幫助小學生學習口語而編寫。

sentences.english: Click to draw dots or drag to draw strokes.
sentences.chinese: 點擊可以畫點，拖曳則畫出手繪的形狀。

sentences.english: Mehndi is applied to the hands and feet of the would-be bride.
sentences.chinese: 新娘會在其手上和腳上繪上“曼海蒂”。

sentences.english: Fig. 52. The trees behind this convent were done on wet on wet watercolor paper.
sentences.chinese: 女修道院後的樹是繪在溼性水彩畫紙上的。

sentences.english: Star-hyun in his diary painted a portrait of Helen, to write poems.
sentences.chinese: 星鉉在自己的日記本里繪美玲的肖像，寫情詩。

sentences.english: Inom trying to draw a horse.
I paint you and fashion you ever with my love longings.
sentences.chinese: 我用愛的渴望繪繡你的嬌韻。

sentences.english: This is an art museum rich in paintings by the Dutch masters.
sentences.chinese: 這是座收藏很多荷蘭大師繪作品品的美術陳列館。

sentences.english: Commander Wolffe's clone troopers have stylized wolf muzzles painted on their helmets.
sentences.chinese: 沃爾夫指揮官的克隆人士兵的頭盔上都繪有狼臉圖形。

definition: to draw/picture/painting/CL:幅[fu2],張|张[zhang1]/classifier for paintings etc/variant of 劃|划[hua4]
to create/to produce/to write/creative work/creation/CL:個|个[ge4]
pen/pencil/writing brush/to write or compose/the strokes of Chinese characters/classifier for sums of money, deals/CL:支[zhi1],枝[zhi1]
